org.gag.production

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gag.production.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    This part of the GAG project set the shape of the profile and the task Each profiles and tasks of a production is composed of some defined parameters - A sort : the ID of the profile or the task - An Affectation : left hand side expression(affectation) - A contraction : right hand side expression(contraction)
    Author:
    Andre GUENEY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Task() 
      Task(Sort<?> sort, java.util.Map<Selector<?>,Term> affect, java.util.Map<Selector<?>,Term> contract)
      This constructor initialize the attributes of the Production profile or task
